attributes.action: Find a solution to the housing shortage and increasing rents in London
attributes.additional_details:
The government should act now to build more quality social housing in London.

Benefits would include:
Making the rental market more competitive for landlords forcing them to increase standards and lower rents.

Making it easier for young people to get on the property ladder.

Creating jobs in the construction industry to boost the economy.

Increasing social happiness and community cohesion by providing quality homes for all.
